text: allāhu avanṟe anugrahattil ninn taṅṅaḷkku tanniṭṭuḷḷatil piśukk kāṇikkunnavar atavarkk guṇakaramāṇenn orikkaluṁ vicārikkarut‌. alla, avarkk dēāṣakaramāṇat‌. avar piśukk kāṇicca dhanaṁ keāṇṭ uyirtteḻunnēlpinṟe nāḷil avaruṭe kaḻuttil māla cārttappeṭunnatāṇ‌. ākāśaṅṅaḷuṭeyuṁ bhūmiyuṭeyuṁ anantarāvakāśaṁ allāhuvinatre. allāhu niṅṅaḷ pravarttikkunnatellāṁ sūkṣmamāyi aṟiyunnavanākunnu
